channel.title: Quests help
channel.description: Hello i have a problem how can i remover all my quests so when i click something it doesent say "you have to do _____ do go here" im useing delta and alot of my server members dont liek this can someone help me on adding portals to my server so they can tle to my castle wars

item.title: Quests help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I said Private message me the classes, don’t post them

Read full topic

item.title: Quests help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:5, topic:381522”]nvm it dident work

[quote]public int q1 = 15;
public int q2 = 15;
public int q3 = 15;
public int q4 = 15;
public int q5 = 15;
public int q6 = 15;
public int q7 = 15;
public int q8 = 15;
public int q9 = 15;
public int q10 = 15;
public int q11 = 15;[/quote]
thats how it is anything wrong? i got no errors also[/quote]

Put your client.java on www.pastebin.com, and I’ll fix it for you.

[quote=“www.sagi-x.com, post:6, topic:381522”][quote]The fuck?

Go into Player.java and search up: “q1 =” you should then see a bunch of varibles that say:

Code (Java): [Select]q1 = 0;q2 = 0;q3 = 0;
… etc. Then change the 0’s too 15.[/quote]

I thought he meant the quest tab. For the portal spawn a portal, and go to ActionHandler, go to ClickObject.java
and put case portal object id: c.getPA().startTeleport(xcoords, ycoords, 0, "modern"); break;[/quote]

x1 att ftw x:

im useing delta

@sagi: You’re even more stupid than I thought; that code is for Project Insanity and will not work on delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Quests help
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

The fuck?

Go into Player.java and search up: “q1 =” you should then see a bunch of varibles that say:

Code (Java): [Select]q1 = 0;q2 = 0;q3 = 0;
… etc. Then change the 0’s too 15.

I thought he meant the quest tab. For the portal spawn a portal, and go to ActionHandler, go to ClickObject.java
and put case portal object id: c.getPA().startTeleport(xcoords, ycoords, 0, "modern"); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Quests help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

www.sagi-x.com:

It may be client sided

The fuck?

Go into Player.java and search up: “q1 =” you should then see a bunch of varibles that say:

q1 = 0; q2 = 0; q3 = 0;

… etc. Then change the 0’s too 15.

And for the portals just spawn an object and go to your first click object packet

Read full topic

item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

It may be client sided, highly doubted, most probable that is in PlayerAssistance.java or client.java, just seach in both of them like monkey madness or desert treasure (if that is what you mean). For the portals, do you want portals at home to get to castle wars or to get into the teams?
